::: {#exr-rhinosaurus-throw-gloves}
Consider this function, a low-order polynomial:

$$h(x, y) \equiv a + b x + c y + d x y + h x^2 + k y^2$$

a. Write down, in symbols, $\int h(x, y) dy$.

b. Use your answer to (a) to calculate $\int_0^1 h(x,y) dy$.

`r vspace(2)`

:::
